entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Rouyn-Noranda
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:44 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 20 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
